description:
🗣🧠 Melinda Gates just said that black people will be the first after healthcare workers who “need to get the covid vaccine”. Bill Gates says Africa is far overpopulated. Bill Gates’s father was the head of planned parenthood which was a group started by the racist Margaret Sanger and has resulted in millions of black babies being aborted. Two French doctors said the covid vaccine should be tested on unwilling Africans.
.
If we want to do something about racism, let’s start with the pharmaceutical industry and the Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation.
.
.#RealEyesRealizeRealLies
.#WakeUpBeforeItsTooLate
